dice_rolling.description: Used for risky actions with uncertain outcomes

when_to_roll.roll: When action is risky and outcome is uncertain
no_roll: When action can be easily accomplished

attributes.FORCEFUL: For displays of strength (kicking doors, powerful weapons, intimidation)
attributes.TACTICAL: For applications of logic (disguises, hacking, machinery)
attributes.CREATIVE: For expressions of will (speeches, bluffing, psychic manipulation)
attributes.REFLEXIVE: For feats of agility (dodging, precise weapons, parrying)

results.6_or_below: Failure - action fails, things go wrong
results.7_to_9: Partial success - action succeeds with cost/complication
results.double_sixes: Ultra success - action succeeds with spectacular bonus

referee_rules.referee_role: Narrates things that are about to happen

combat_rules.description: Combat follows same dice rolling mechanics

active_combat.definition: Situation where two or more parties are aware and attempting to harm each other

defending.failure: Always incurs damage in active combat

rules_of_engagement.active_combat: Failing in dangerous situations outside active combat doesn't necessarily incur damage
